alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 04 at 2:38PM MST until March 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands
